commit message: * Updated version to 1.8.5 code 2208
* Fixed not cleaning up failed connections properly.
* Updated to version 1.8.6 code 2308
* Added steven cote's interactive button patch to patches directory

* Patched trunk with steven cote's interactive button patch
* Added drawables provided by steven cote.
* Updated project properties to SDK 19
* Moved mythmote button colors to colors.xml
* Created dark button theme
* Updated media control image resource to have higher DPI versions available.
* Added fetchFrontendLocation() by address and port.
* Renamed mythmote button drawables and colors to define light and dark versions of the buttons.
* Fixed button backgrounds to dark squares for the time being. Need to make this follow the app theme.
* Added initial implementation of CONNECT_TO_FRONTEND intent. **Untested**. Need to implement triggering intent from Mythtv Android Frontend.

* Fixed not properly getting the intent that started Mythmote activity.
* Improved intent handling.
* Fixed sql query in fetchFrontendLocation()
* Fixed selecting existing frontend from intent.
* Added selectable application themes. Work in progress.

* Created AbstractMythmoteFragmentActivity.getThemeStyle(theme)
* Fixed not returning a style for dark glow
* Updated strings and style resources
* Added missing files from patches
* Implemented intial dark glow theme based on 2013-12-09-dark-glow-buttons.patch
* Updated target SDK to 19
* Removed static reference to MythCom in MythMote activity.
* Added restarting Mythmote when preference theme does not match current application theme.
* Removed application restart warning to theme preference description
* Fixed lint warning
* Changed version to 1.9.0 code 2408
* Added interactive TV fragment to phone view pager layout.
* Added interactive TV fragment to tablet / Largescreen layouts
* Updated version code to 2508 version name to V1.9.0.1 to produce a quick beta with interactive tv fragment available.
